mods.abstract: RUNAWAY IN PRISON. WAS committed to jail here, mulatto JEROME, claiming to belong to C. P. Heygood of Alexandria. Jerome is about 25 years old-5ft. 9 or 10 in. high, well built, good looking, and will weigh about 160 lbs. The owner is hereby notified to reclaim him in the manner required by law. THEO. BLANCHARD, Sheriff.

detail.title: Gazette and sentinel. : (Plaquemine, Parish of Iberville, La.) 1858-1864
